111.content:
BOOM! The east side of the house explodes. from the wreckage climbs Michelle, who is astounded that she survived the blast. She had been working on a cell-division compound that would theoretically speed up cell growth, thereby allowing doctors to seal wounds in seconds. Apparently, the compound was less than stable.

She felt strange, however. She hoped that the area wasn't radioactive. Suddenly, she felt a shooting pain in her bones. she clenched her eyes, and felt her ears pop. When she opened her eyes again, she was surprised to find that she was much larger. She had grown to about 80 feet in height, making people roughly the size of mice to her. At first she was mildly intrigued- She postulated that the compound had accelerated her cell growth, but instead of sticking to her genetic code and stopping at her normal height, decided to simply increase the size of everything.

After about two minutes, she realized that she was actually gigantic, and this offered many new possibilities. She thought she should use this opportunity to...
111.title: Michelle

choices: Squish them all at once!
Squish them one at a time!
Torture them!
1112.content:
She decided that she was likely stuck gigantic perminantly. However, this also gave her a unique opportunity- She could now make a difference in the world! She could destroy the greedy people ruining the pharmecutical industry, for example! She lived in a suburb a few miles from the city. She decided that she may as well get some practice crushing before she went off to the city. It was mid day, however, so everyone from the neighborhood was at work or school. A fire truck and police car rode up to her house, apparently called in about the rather unsubtle explosion in the neighborhood. An officer got out of his car and looked up at the giant woman- "I don't believe this!" he said, as he reached for his radio. The firemen got out of their trucks, dazed by the surreal sight. "I don't think you need to go calling anyone." said Michelle, as she stepped forward, lifting her foot over the officer. She dropped her foot slowly onto him, pressing him lower towards the concrete. she could feel him squirming and hear small cries muffled by her foot. She pressed down quickly, and SQUISH! the man popped like a grape, and she felt warm ooze spread over the ball of her foot. The firemen stood gaping, as she turned and stompped on their truck, which crunched and broke under her foot. she picked up one fireman, while thoughtlessly smashing the other under her foot with a quick step. He crunched and popped loudly, and a spray of blood splashed her shoes.

the tiny man in her hand pulled a utility knife from his belt and slashed at her fingers, cutting her slightly. She gasped and dropped him- he landed hard but survived. "I was going to let you live until you did that!" she yelled, angered by his audacity. She lifted her goo-covered shoe and put it on his face. "Clean my shoe! Lick their guts off my feet!" she told him. He refused, turning away and trying to stand and run. She grabbed him and took off her shoe, before placing him inside and putting her socked foot back into it. She walked slowly, for several minutes making sure that she stayed on the ball of her foot to crush his legs first. Finally, she pressed down with her toes, and felt the squirming fireman pop and gush, his blood soaking into her sock. She took out her foot and looked in her shoe- There was nothing solid left inside, the man had been completely liquified and turned into paste. She slipped her shoe back on and started off when she noticed some schoolgirls who had skipped school who had probably seen her crushing.

But she needed to go take care of something in another room and had left you alone for the moment, what could go wrong afterall. Turning around you lowered your butt over it and let out a five second long SBD. The roach wriggled in agony as you laughed. Unfortunately it wasn't as stunned as you thought. It rushed your foot, and in surprise you stumbled forward. Your arm hit the nozzle of a device though you didn't notice. Turning around you promptly sat your butt on the roach, squashing it under your ass. "Serves you right!" As you stood up and shook off the remains of the roach, or what you could get off, you heard a low hiss, followed by a huge explosion.

As the smoke cleared you saw that much of your house had been leveled. But as you glanced around you realized you were seeing it from the air. Slowly standing up you dusted off your butt again as you looked down at the house. Were you really this big? At least 100 feet tall, you laughed loudly as you took a few steps, looking down at the tiny bugs around you, the people even smaller then that roach before! 1141.content:
So you had just been minding your own business is your Mom's lab, well as much as you could be in a place you weren't supposed to be in in the first place, when suddenly the floor slipped out from under you! Actually you had spilled a little water on it when you'd washed your hands a few moments before and not realized until you'd already slipped. You'd just been wanting to get the layout of the lab so you could play a prank on your Mom later, but as you stumbled forward from the water you fell atop a few beakers. At first you were really scared, if the glass broke you were in serious trouble! Fortunately they proved perfectly durable as you landed and knocked them over.

Unfortunately the chemicals still spilled out and mixed together. Steam blew up from the desk as the chemicals poured in. You immediately stepped back from the bad smelling vapors, before the bubbling liquid touched a nearby device. A low sizzling sound reached your ears and you ducked under a desk, just as the lab went up in a huge explosion! About half the house was leveled in the resulting explosion, and you could see sunlight up above as your vision blurred. You'd been hit, but didn't seem to be hurt. As you slowly sat up, you rubbed your head a bit. "Oh no! Mommy's gonna kill me for this!" You stood up, frantically looking around to see if there was any way you could hide that you did this. At that point your vision got a bit fuzzy, and you looked around at the sky and buildings in the distance. Sky and buildings in the distance?

Sure enough, you were now enormous in height, at least fifty feet, barely fitting in the rubble of your former home. As you stood up you brushed off, just in time for your mom, sisters, and cousin to step out of the house, all of them staring up at you in total disbelief. You nervously waved a bit at first. "Oh man I'm in trou...ble?" A big grin came to your face as you realized that you had the power now, they were all the size of toys to you afterall!

I know you're in here somewhere" You'd yell once more as you approached her table, banging your fingers against it as you would hear a loud, ecstatic groan would be heard behind a door in the far end of the room, followed by intense, booming sounds of diarrhea and farting.

"What the...!" You exclaimed as your eyes widened. Everything was gigantic. "That vial... It couldn't be!" But it was, a shrinking serum. You were now just a few inches tall, about 2 or 3 in fact. Looking around, you realized you were.

info.brief_description: Squishing, squashing smushing crushing and farting.
info.description:
A series of stories branching out from one group-

You live with your aunt and three cousins- Your aunt is a biochemist, and your cousins are typical young females. You were acting up, and as a substitute for juvinile detention, you were sent to your aunt's for "community service", which entails helping her in her lab. Your aunt, unbeknownst to you, had injected you with a cell-regeneration serum, which theoretically prevents you from dying by reforming cells that die. The short version is that you can get hurt, but you come back from it.

You- yourself. You may choose this perspective if you want to interact with a girl. You live with your aunt and female cousins. Due to the serum, you can't die. This is a good choice for continual, repeated punishment from the victim's POV.

Your Aunt Michelle- She is 35 and attractive, with brown hair and eyes. She is an average adult, but she hides some hidden fetishes.

Rebecca- your cousin. She is 14 and is entering a goth phase- She wears dark clothes and big, treaded boots. She has her hair dyed blue and enjoys stomping on bugs outside.

Sarah- Your next cousin, she is 10. She likes to try to get attention by grossing people out by picking her nose or farting. She likes to be the center of attention, and is quite ambitious about getting it.

Mika- Mika is your youngest cousin at 7. She is clever and mischievous. She likes to play pranks on people and tease people.
